mapper.select: SELECT ac.id, ac.CODE, ac.NAME, ac.three_z_file_id as threeZFileId, ac.three_f_file_id as threeFFileId FROM mini_appraisal_certificate ac LEFT JOIN mini_appraisal a on a.certificate_code = ac.code where a.create_user = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT c.* FROM mini_appraisal_certificate c LEFT JOIN mini_appraisal a ON a.certificate_code = c.code LEFT JOIN mini_project_user u ON a.create_user = u.id where 1=1
and c.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and u.phone = #{phone}
and c.create_time like concat('%',#{createTime},'%')
